DataElement.preferredName: Patient Fulfill Renal Function Guideline For Imaging Procedures Confirmation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The status of patient eligibility verification to address the renal function guidelines for imaging procedures as outlined in the study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Satisfy the requirements or expectations of._Pertaining to the physiologic processes of the kidneys._A systematic statement of policy rules or principles. Guidelines may be developed by government agencies at any level, institutions, professional societies, governing boards, or by convening expert panels._The reason of something._Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy._Having been established or verified._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. Property.preferredName: Fulfill Renal Function Guideline For Imaging Technique Confirmation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Satisfy the requirements or expectations of.:Pertaining to the physiologic processes of the kidneys.:Directions or principles presenting current or future rules of policy. Guidelines may be developed by government agencies at any level, institutions, professional societies, governing boards, or by the convening of expert panels. The text may be cursive or in outline form but is generally a comprehensive guide to problems and approaches in any field of activity. For guidelines in the field of health care and clinical medicine, PRACTICE GUIDELINES is available.:The reason of something.:Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.:Having been established or verified.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Satisfy the requirements or expectations of.
Pertaining to the physiologic processes of the kidneys.

A systematic statement of policy rules or principles. Guidelines may be developed by government agencies at any level, institutions, professional societies, governing boards, or by convening expert panels.
Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.
